name: Drift Alley
description:
Made during the 32 bit jam 2021 for about 2 or 3 weeks time. Drift Alley is a short moc up game of the usual 1 race demos you could find on the ps1 back when demo discs were a thing.  Its main inspiration is explosive racing which i hope is apparent with the slippery handeling,

Music from PlayOnLoop: Knock Out, Twin Turbo.

KEYBOARD INPUT:

Acceleration/Up :W/UP

Reverse/Down: S/DOWN

Turn/Left or right: A or D/ LEFT or RIGHT

Drift/Accept Button: LEFT SHIFT/,

Change View: E/-

Pause: ESC/P

XBOX 1 CONTROLLER INPUT;

Acceleration: X

Reverse:  B

Drift/Accept Button: A

Turn/Left or right: LEFT JOYSTICK

Up/Down: LEFT JOYSTICK

Change View: Y

Pause: START BUTTON

KNOWN BUGS:

UI breaks when game resolution isnt correct(1400x1050)

Collision can be wonky

collision triggers when driving off downhill
